data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Data::DPath does for arbitrarily nested hash/array/object Perl
    structures what XML::XPath does for XML documents. The inspiration
    for this comes from both XML::XPath and the Template Toolkit stash
    module.
